title: [Widdley's Handcrafts, Metal]
description: Small piles of metal shavings have been swept into one corner of the room.  A jeweler's bench rests against one wall of the room below a pair of glass-paned lanterns.  A miniature forge rests on the flat stone floor next to a rack of hammers.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
